text: [Music]
it's hard to imagine our modern society
without the advent of social networking
smartphones banks airplanes oil
platforms and cute cat videos and yet we
hardly ever look at the creatures that
make all of this possible
this is an ordinary IT office it's the
natural habitat for developers but today
it's empty that's because they have all
migrated here to a conference for
developers only it's called the MDC
every year thousands of developers from
all over the world flock to this
breeding ground to hatch out new ideas
their ability to immediately assimilate
massive amounts of data is the reason
they control almost everything in the
world the NDC's rich ecosystem is
enchanting
the advanced food supply is necessary
for sustaining the developers cranial
activity over these three important days
although a friendly species developers
often lock horns in a coding battle this
is how developers find the Alpha
developer of the herd the NDC is also a
place for developers to interact with
each other the different species
gathered at this conference are
entertained by normal you
beings in the evening to build
friendships for future collaborations
[Music]
after three days the developers have
gained knowledge and made important
alliances but after a short period in
hibernation they will migrate to the
next big event not far away
